Address.label: Address
Address.value: 345 PARK AVENUE, SAN JOSE, California, 95110-2704, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Adobe provides content creation, document management, and digital marketing and advertising software and services to creative professionals and marketers for creating, managing, delivering, measuring, optimizing and engaging with compelling content multiple operating systems, devices and media. The company operates with three segments: digital media content creation, digital experience for marketing solutions, and publishing for legacy products (less than 5% of revenue).

value.name: Cynthia A. Stoddard
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
